text: kavurun (visvasavantayinta) haniyak kirimatada, pratiksepaya visiruva hærimatada, visvasavantayin atare venvimak æti kirimatada, palamuven allah samagada, ohuge dutaya samagada, yuddha kala ayata sængavena sthanayak bavata tibimatada, ek næmadumpalak idi kara ættoda ovun, (tamange væradi sangava gænimata adahas kara) “niyata vasayema api hondakma misa (napurak) adahas kale næta” yayi divrannaha. namut allah nam, niyata vasayenma ovun borukarayin yayi saksi daranneya
